text: New owners don't want to be competitive with little Caesar's and is charging 11 bucks for a 1 topping large rather than the 7 they were previously.  Yeah no thanks the pizza is good (usually) but not that good.  I'll be sticking with LC and store bought for now. Shame.

text: My husband just returned from H.H. in durand., where he watched an emplyee make an antipasta salad for us. Everytime the kid put cheese on it ,He Ate the Cheese off his gloves and then dove into the next topping!!!!!  Everybodys greatest fear!!!! This is a true story.  Geesh!!!
